pages.text: The $(eclipse)Eclipse Monarch$() is the lord of darkness, ruling over the Eclipse Wastes.$(br2)$(l)Summoning:$()$(br)$(li)Find an $(item)Eclipse Sanctum$() in Eclipse Wastes$(li)Use $(item)Meteorite Fragment$() on the $(item)Eclipse Altar$()$(li)Ensure 8+ Eclipse Stone around the altar$(br2)$(l)Attacks:$()$(br)$(li)Dark projectiles$(li)AOE shadow burst$(li)Summons Eclipse Phantoms

pages.title: Rewards
pages.text: $(l)Drops:$()$(br)$(li)$(item)Eclipse Core$() (guaranteed)$(li)Shadow Essence$(li)Void Shards$(br2)The Eclipse Core is used to craft the $(eclipse)Eclipse Armor Set$() - the ultimate dark equipment with life steal and enemy debuffs.
